definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: Now when she had weaned Loruhamah, she conceived, and bare a son.
sentences.chinese: 歌篾給羅路哈瑪斷奶以後，又懷孕生了一個兒子。

sentences.english: Depriving him of the breast, could lead to serious problems in his personality development.
sentences.chinese: 過早斷奶，會對他的人格發展造成嚴重影響。

sentences.english: Kids can follow the mother goat almost immediately after birth. Kids are weaned after 6 months.
sentences.chinese: 幼山羊出生後會立即跟隨母山羊，在6個月後斷奶。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a better treatment to cure chronic enteritis in weaned monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索斷奶仔猴慢性腸炎的較優治療方案。

sentences.english: The experiment was conducted to study the effects of oligosaccharides on rumen microflora of weanling lambs.
sentences.chinese: 本試驗旨在研究低聚糖對斷奶羔羊瘤胃菌羣的影響。

sentences.english: First, must correct the manner, everything cannot act with undue haste, is weaned is also same.
sentences.chinese: 首先，要端正態度，凡事不能操之過急，斷奶也一樣。

sentences.english: The weaned piglets diarrhea was a kind of disease that seriously harmed swine industry.
sentences.chinese: 斷奶仔豬腹瀉是一類嚴重危害養豬業發展的疾病。

sentences.english: Were we not weaned till then, But sucked on country pleasures, childishly ?
sentences.chinese: 莫非我們還沒斷奶，只知吮吸田園之樂像孩子一般？

sentences.english: All mice were fed an "atherogenic diet" from the age of 3 weeks after being weaned.
sentences.chinese: 所有實驗小鼠自3周齡斷奶後高脂飼餵。

sentences.english: It is vitally important to encourage piglets to maintain fluid intake post-weaning.
sentences.chinese: 仔豬斷奶時維持液體攝取量極其重要。

sentences.english: The police might not be too keen on seeing your newly acquired weaners in the boot of your car.
sentences.chinese: 警察也許不會對你新買的斷奶小豬感興趣。

sentences.english: Sensible resolution bunnies weaning, the mother good rest, keep a good body.
sentences.chinese: 明理的小兔子決議斷奶，讓母親好好歇息，養好身體。

sentences.english: Many females return to a mini-cycle several times while weaning kittens.
sentences.chinese: 一些母貓在給小貓斷奶時會出現幾次小的發情期。

sentences.english: A newly weaned child or young animal.
sentences.chinese: 幻兒，仔獸剛斷奶的幼兒，離。

sentences.english: Mixed gold tail eclectic parrot 4 months not weaned.
sentences.chinese: 混金尾折中鸚鵡4個月大還沒斷奶。

sentences.english: No animals, except for humans, consume milk after being weaned.
sentences.chinese: 除了人類，沒有動物在斷奶後再喝奶。

definition: to leap and frisk about (idiom); lively/healthy and active
young married woman/mistress/(fig.) punching bag/(old) child bride
voice change (at puberty)/to alter one's voice (deliberately)/to sound different (when angry etc)
to seethe/to sulk/to be pissed off (vulgar)
unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
